ygData.subject: Re: Where to go?
ygData.msgSnippet: I think it s time for you to make a boat trip. A good place that I hunted from level 11-13 (Although in a group...) is North Karana. At level 13-14, you should
ygData.messageBody:
I think it's time for you to make a boat trip. A good place that I hunted from level 11-13 (Although in a group...) is North Karana. At level 13-14, you should be able to solo this area fairly well. Make sure you have a magical weapon, as Wisps are a common sight in the area. Avoid Hill Giants and Griff/awns/ons/ennes. If one of these locks on to you, you're better of running for a zone instead of the guards. I liked to hunt near the gypsy camp, as this is where I saw most of the wisps.

Lulen
Bard of the 13th Chorus
Solusek Ro

----- Original Message -----
From: Tanthalias
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 19:28
Subject: [eqbards] Where to go?


I just reached level 12, and now the things I used to hunt in Steamfront all con green. Where should I go from here? I could stay here and kill mino's, but they're too hard to find (camped most of the time). Where should I go from here? What's good for level 12? Any help is greatly appreciated.

Tanthalias
Half Elven Bard, 12th Circle
Tarew Marr
